mapper.insert: insert into t_personnel (ID, UserName, Sex, TeamID, Flag, Pwd, IndeustryID, shoppType, Ranges, Isreceive, WorkType, em, miaoshu, taidu, shudu, xiaoliang, xinyongdengji, hangye, badlv, MJscore, MJbean, FacePic, Place, IsPlaceSame, XiYongFirst, XiYongLast, IsDirector, RecruitmentId, DesignerLevel, ShieldingTime, ShieldNumber, LockTime, ContainKeyWords, UnContainKeyWords, NumberOfTradesStart, NumberOfTradesEnd, Operation_levelID, Recent_single_time, is_stop ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{indeustryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ranges,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isreceive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{worktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{em,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{miaoshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taidu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shudu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xiaoliang,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xinyongdengji,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hangye,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{badlv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mjscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mjbean,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{facepic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isplacesame,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xiyongfirst,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xiyonglast,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdirector,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recruitmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{designerlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shieldingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shieldnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{containkeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uncontainkeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberoftradesstart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numberoftradesend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationLevelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recentSingleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isStop,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.select: SELECT pp.`UserName` FROM t_personnel pp WHERE pp.`ID` = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT pp.`UserName` FROM Personnel pp WHERE pp.`ID` = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT pp.`UserName` FROM t_personnel pp WHERE pp.`ID` = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT pp.`UserName` FROM Personnel pp WHERE pp.`ID` = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT DISTINCT pp.`ID`,pp.`UserName` FROM t_personnel pp
SELECT DISTINCT pp.ID,pp.UserName FROM Personnel pp
SELECT DISTINCT tt.`TeamName` FROM (`t_personnel` pp LEFT JOIN t_team tt ON pp.TeamID = tt.ID)LEFT JOIN t_customer cc ON cc.TScustomer=pp.ID WHERE pp.`ID` = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT DISTINCT tt.`TeamName` FROM (Personnel pp LEFT JOIN Team tt ON pp.TeamID = tt.ID)LEFT JOIN Customer cc ON cc.TScustomer=pp.ID WHERE pp.`ID` = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select DISTINCT tt.`TeamName`,tt.ID FROM (`t_personnel` pp LEFT JOIN t_team tt ON pp.TeamID = tt.ID)LEFT JOIN t_customer cc ON cc.TScustomer=pp.ID
select DISTINCT tt.`TeamName`,tt.ID FROM (Personnel pp LEFT JOIN Team tt ON pp.TeamID = tt.ID)LEFT JOIN Customer cc ON cc.TScustomer=pp.ID

SELECT DISTINCT cu.WangWangNum,cu.TScustomer,cr.PersonnelID,cu.ShoppType,pp.UserName, pp.TeamID,tt.TeamName,cu.TechnologyRecruitmentID,p2.UserName pname,p3.UserName tename from (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM CustomerRecords WHERE Trader = #{wangwangnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY ID DESC) AS cr LEFT JOIN (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM Customer WHERE WangWangNum = #{wangwangnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY ID DESC) AS cu ON cu.WangWangNum = cr.Trader LEFT JOIN Personnel pp ON cu.TScustomer = pp.ID LEFT JOIN Team tt ON tt.ID = pp.TeamID LEFT JOIN Personnel p2 ON p2.ID = cr.PersonnelID LEFT JOIN Personnel p3 on cu.TechnologyRecruitmentID =p3.ID where cu.WangWangNum =#{wangwangnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
